Germany: Siege of Narbonne (752–59): Pepin the Short laid siege to Narbonne, still held by forces loyal to Yusuf ibn 'Abd al-Rahman al-Fihri, governor of Al-Andalus under the defunct Umayyad Caliphate.
Indinesia: The Hindu Medang (Mataram) kingdom flourishes and declines. (to 1045)
Japan: The Great Buddha of Nara at Tōdai-ji was completed with the assistance of Bodhisena from India
